com.scriptrts.game
Class GameObject

java.lang.Object
  com.scriptrts.game.GameObject

public class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object

Unit class which only implements most basic functions.

Constructor Detail

GameObject

public GameObject(Player p,
                  Sprite[] sprites,
                  java.awt.image.BufferedImage artImg,
                  int speed,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  Direction direction,
                  boolean shaped,
                  UnitClass unitClass)
Create a new unit

Parameters:
p - player to whom this unit owes allegiance
sprites - array of sprites used to display the image
speed - unit's speed of movement
x - unit's starting location x coordinate
y - unit's starting location y coordinate
direction - direction in which the unit is facing originally
shaped - if false, this unit takes up one square; if true, it can take up more.
